chapter.title: Requirements
chapter.para: Spring Hadoop requires JDK level 6.0 (just like Hadoop) and above, Spring Framework 3.0 and above and Hadoop 0.20.2 (0.205.0 recommended) and above. Regarding Hadoop-related projects, SDHP requires HBase 0.90.x, Hive 0.7.x and Pig 0.9.x or above. As a rule of thumb, when using Hadoop-related projects, such as Hive or Pig, use the required Hadoop version as a basis for discovering the supported versions.
